DOC.brief_summary: Proof concept : Superiority Bronchipret Sinupret placebo respect mucociliary clearance
DOC.brief_title: Trial With Bronchipret Sinupret Evaluate Acceleration Mucociliary Clearance ( MCC )
DOC.criteria: 1 . Volunteers give sign declaration consent sign data protection declaration 2 . Male female volunteer 25 40 year 3 . Current smoker ( 520 cigarette per day since 5 year least ) 4 . Ability taste sweetness saccharin 5 . Perception sweetness within 30 minute placement saccharin behind nasal valve 1 . Ciliary dyskinesia 2 . Cystic fibrosis 3 . COPD/emphysema 4 . Asthma 5 . Chronic rhinosinusitis 6 . Acute respiratory tract infection within last 6 week prior enrolment 7 . Septal sinus surgery 8 . Symptomatic allergic rhinitis 9 . Known allergic rhinitis 10 . Treatment notpermitted previous concomitant therapy 11 . History snuff consumption longer 1 month intranasal consumption recreational drug cocaine heroin longer 1 month 12 . Any disease condition might affect safety subject trial , accord investigator 's judgement
